title: Frame․io collaboration video editor now part of Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects
content:
Remote collaboration has been more popular than ever these past two years. For video creators, things are about to get easier with the latest revision to Adobe’s Creative Cloud.

more…

The post Frame․io collaboration video editor now part of Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Amid consumer demand, Adobe is now offering Frame.io for Creative Cloud for customers with Premiere Pro and After Effects.
